text:
e="preserve">Jon Dwane "Jaguar Jon" Arnett (April 20, 1935 – January 16, 2021) was an American professional football player. He was a first-team All-American. He was born in Los Angeles, California. He played for the Los Angeles Rams from 1957 to 1963 and for the Chicago Bears from 1964 to 1966.
Arnett died on January 16, 2021 from heart failure in Lake Oswego, Oregon at the age of 85.
